sections.heading: Appeal; procedure.An order of the commission which has become final may be appealed, and the appeal shall be in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act
sections.text: SourceLaws 1973, LB 68, ยง 30;Laws 1981, LB 238, ยง 4;Laws 1988, LB 352, ยง 169.Cross ReferencesAdministrative Procedure Act, see section 84-9
